title: Ally calls me "Facist Trump supporter" while I was just having fun playing AP Bard.
body:
And I'm a Japanese that doesn't have the power to vote in USA.
These kids are just unbelivable of how rude they are. I was just having fun with AP Bard in a damn ARAM game, and one Veigar kept screeching out all game "Build tank Bard". And I said "No, why do I need to." and then he labelled me a Trump supporter and a facist racist. I calmly said I was Japanese so I have no power to vote, but he then called me "I would vote for him anyway".
<Removed by Moderation>

I've been called a libtard for playing bard support and telling somebody I wasn't going to follow a bad engage. 

Also not American. People use politics as a charicature for everything they hate and it's not good for politics or the random things they feel the need to inject politics into.

I don't want to talk politics here, but it's sad when either side uses "Haha you're an X voter" as an insult. I think it's a result of not being able to think freely or having a stupidly tiny IQ. 

Love others regardless of who they vote for :-). (comment directed mostly towards NA, hopefully Japan doesn't share our problem).

I'll admit to being a bit _facist_.  At first glance, I'm more willing to listen to a pretty person.  It's a shallow prejudice, I know.
